```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data = read.csv("C:/Users/asd11/OneDrive/桌面/covid19_tw_specimen.csv")
head(data)
```
```{r}
library(stringr)
data$日期=str_sub(data$通報日,start= 6,end=-1L)
```

```{r}
data$月份 = str_split(data$日期, pattern = "/", n = 2, simplify = FALSE)
```
```{r}
for (i in data$月份) 
{
  print(i[1])
}
```


```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = 月份[1] ,y = Total)) + geom_line() 
```


```{r}
ggplot(data,aes(x=通報日,y=Total)) + geom_line()
```
